title: Updated to the 67 Update!!!
content: Huge Update!! Mass of UI changes and way way more!! https://github.com/voidstrap/Voidstrap/releases/tag/v1.0.6.7 https://discord.gg/bxPuJEHQYA

title: HUGE UPDATE TODAY!!!!
content: Huge Huge Update today on UI and way way more no joke!!! https://github.com/voidstrap/Voidstrap https://discord.gg/bxPuJEHQYA

title: Thank yall for 350k DOWNLOADS!!!!
content: This meant a ton to me when I first saw it thank yallllll!!!!!! https://github.com/voidstrap/Voidstrap

Updated! Fully updated music player fixed all RPC bugs added shuffling instead of next song, and more. Updated some UI and icons. Added 'Apply Global Settings' (not the Global Settings page) and 'Check for Updates'. Added Roblox Priority from Plexity. Updated channels replaced dropdown box with a textbox. Added more FFlags to the FFlags page. Improved news loading. Made Roblox launch/install faster updated code for both. Fully updated the About page: added my friends and more, including Return (helped with Global Settings page ðŸ’œ). Added custom image support to the RPC area. Added account switcher/account backups. Added 'Disable CrashHandler' as an option instead of auto-disabling it. Added new 'Ultra Gray' theme (comes with custom buttons). Fully updated GBS/Global Settings page with more options. Updated to .NET 8.0.
